gaia::storage::ParcelFileDescriptor::AutoCloseInputStream Class Reference

An InputStream you can create on a ParcelFileDescriptor, which will take care of calling ParcelFileDescriptor::close() for you when the stream is closed. More...

#include <ParcelFileDescriptor.h>

Detailed Description

An InputStream you can create on a ParcelFileDescriptor, which will take care of calling ParcelFileDescriptor::close() for you when the stream is closed.
